(Infra_RedisCache)" as Bench state "Select candidate for PoC" as Select state "Reject or defer candidate" as Reject state "Document decision and risks" as Document [Infra_WorkerNode] --> Define Define --> Shortlist Shortlist --> Fit: fits platform constraints Shortlist --> Reject: lacks required support Fit --> Bench Bench --> Select: meets PoC targets Bench --> Shortlist: fails targets Reject --> Shortlist Select --> Document Document --> [Infra_RedisCache]
